price: وە داوای لێخۆش بونیش لەپەروەردگارتان بکەن پاشان بگەڕێنەوە بۆلای بەڕاستی پەروەردگارم میھرەبان و دڵسۆزە
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي رَحِيمٞ وَدُودٞ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfirū rabbakum thumma tūbū ilayhi inna rabbī raḥīmun wadūdun
